"Oh, you're a funny one."  Empath sits down.  "Most people would have 
asked what the hell a Predacon was doing in Maximal headquarters, and 
how I knew your name without meeting you before.  You went straight 
to the argument phase.  I think I'm going to like you."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Ragnar: Neg. I rarely challenge an ally unless they sully my honor. 
> From where I come, though, I am an elite warrior and this mech I 
have 
> become is one of the fiercest ever built. I can take two Predacons 
at 
> once.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Empath::
> > 
> > "He's right, Ragnar."  Empath points out.  "If you want to talk 
> > credentials, I can give you an earful.  And if you were thinking 
of 
> > challenging me to one of your silly trials on that point, I 
promise 
> > you'll be dead before you can land a hit on me."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > ::Aerotaur::
> > >        He eyes Empath cautiously, sizing her up as soon as she 
> > enters the 
> > > room.  He glances at Ragnar.  "She knows of what she speaks.  
You 
> > would be 
> > > wise to listen."  He stands up and walks out into the hall 
casting 
> > a wary 
> > > glance at Empath as he passes her.  He slowly makes his way 
toward 
> > the bridge 
> > > hoping to find something to do.
